wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Adams was a British boxer. He competed in the 1920 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1920 Summer Olympics

response: *Frederick Adams (basketball) (born 1957), former basketball player of the Philippine Basketball Association
*Frederick Adams (planner), son of the architect, Thomas Adams, first department head for urban planning at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology

Paul Erdal (16 May 1902 – 8 February 1985) was a Norwegian boxer who competed in the 1920 Summer Olympics. In 1920 he was eliminated in the quarter-finals of the featherweight class. After a bye in the first round he won his fight against Frederick Adams in the second round but he lost his next bout to the future gold medalist Paul Fritsch.
